title: Is the time for evening adkar, after Maghrib or after Asr? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: faruk says what is the evidence that the time of evening of car starts at mother rib when do you break your fast after sunset why do you break your fast after sunset because this is the time of the night so this is the evening or night and the morning it's one of what the scholars said either after a sir or after Maghrib
